events.name: Red-Team Automation, Deception2.0/Honeypots & Behavior Analytics
events.description:
Presentation details:
Red-Team Automation, Deception 2.0/Honeypots, Behavior Analytics and Incident Resilience Planning.

Speaker's Biography:
A firm believer in well-roundedness and breadth of experience, Michael has spent twenty years (mostly in Japan and other parts of Asia) in various security roles ranging from sysadmin, Unix gateway anti-virus quality assurance engineer, strategic customer liaison, FW/IDS/VA tech support, SIEM/GRC product manager, corporate intelligence operative, ISP malware removal call center project manager, high net worth family office security advisor, partner sales/sales engineering and architect in managed security space for Symantec and FireEye. Presently, he is an independent consultant advising security startups on Asia market entry and helping local system integrator partners to evangelize security maturity among their clients.

-----
Stand a chance to win a free NUS Greyhats T-shirt at Security Wednesdays! Simply come down to find out more about how you can get yours too!
events.location: NUS School of Computing COM1 02-10 Seminar Room 10, , Singapore
